mapper.sql: id, user_id, item_id, receive_num, phone, name, code, district, detailed, receive_time, state, orderId
mapper.insert:
insert into receive_info
id,
user_id,
item_id,
receive_num,
phone,
name,
code,
district,
detailed,
receive_time,
state,
orderId,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{receiveNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update receive_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
receive_num = #{receiveNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailed = #{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update receive_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receive_num = #{receiveNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailed = #{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select i.name,r.receive_time time,r.state,r.orderId from receive_info r,item i where r.item_id=i.id and user_id=#{userId} order by time desc
